### Entity Component System for Python
Entity Component System or ECS is designed to help create a composition of disparate functionalities that are simple by themselves but become complex as they interact with each other.

<dl>
  <dt>Entity</dt>
  <dd>The glue between components.</dd>

  <dt>Component</dt>
  <dd>An instance of a group of related attributes or properties.</dd>

  <dt>Component Template</dt>
  <dd>The blueprint for a group of related attributes or properties.</dd>

  <dt>System</dt>
  <dd>Manipulates all instances of a given Component Template</dd>
</dl>

This was initially an entry in [Ludum Dare 33](http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=34227).

### Installation

#### Stable

    > pip install https://github.com/LearnPythonAndMakeGames/ecs/archive/stable.zip

#### Latest

    > pip install git+https://github.com/LearnPythonAndMakeGames/ecs.git
